pr_title: Optimize NOT IN filter for strings

timeline.author: mbasmanova
mbasmanova
mbasmanova

replies.bodyText: Sorry, got it lost during rebase, will add it back
replies.author: kewang1024

timeline.bodyText: use existing BytesRange::getLower method here and remove newly added getUpper
timeline.author: mbasmanova
mbasmanova
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -142,7 +153,7 @@ public static TupleDomainFilter toFilter(Domain domain)
      *
      * The logic is to return true if ranges are next to each other, but don't include the touch value.
      */
-    private static boolean isNanAllowed(List<Range> ranges)
+    private static boolean isNotIn(List<Range> ranges)

timeline.bodyText: message needs updating: checkArgument(values.length > 0, "values must not be empty");
timeline.author: mbasmanova
mbasmanova

replies.bodyText: Thank you for the detailed suggestion, it's really helpful!
replies.author: kewang1024

timeline.bodyText: @kewang1024 string columns are not yet supported here; either add support or update comment
timeline.author: mbasmanova

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/presto-orc/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/orc/TupleDomainFilterUtils.java b/presto-orc/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/orc/TupleDomainFilterUtils.java
index 4e3ed512af..9a3be757e6 100644
--- a/presto-orc/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/orc/TupleDomainFilterUtils.java
+++ b/presto-orc/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/orc/TupleDomainFilterUtils.java

@@ -142,7 +142,7 @@ public class TupleDomainFilterUtils
     }
 
     /**
-     * Returns true is ranges represent != or NOT IN filter for double, float or string column.
+     * Returns true is ranges represent != or NOT IN filter for double or float.
      *
      * The logic is to return true if ranges are next to each other, but don't include the touch value.
      */

timeline.message: Rename isNanAllowed function and update comment
Optimize NOT IN filter for strings
